reviewText: There is no doubt that this DVD contains loads of information. However, he does a poor job of breaking it down so that the viewer can learn it. For example, he would be in the middle of a flow drill and say if you want to switch sides you could do this, or this, and you could also do a half-hearted here and your partner could do this or that, and then continue on with the drill like the viewer would be able to catch just what happened. 3 stars for poor presentation.
Good DVD!  Good presentation of the Hubud flow drills and switches. I enjoyed it very much and use the drills with my training group. Mr. Grody explains and demos the drills well.
Every movement is explained and detailed the movements are excellent, is perfect for practicing at home go where you can put in DVD
Enjoyed the presentation. This opens a new path to follow that was introduced to drills by visiting sabumnim and follow student.
